name: authorize-fulfillment
description: This request is sent from VTEX to the seller after the payment is approved, to notify them that the fulfillment process can start.

fulfillmentEndpoint.description: This is the fulfillment endpoint registered for each specific external seller in the **seller management** section of VTEX's admin panel.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

sellerOrderId.description: Seller's order ID of the order ready for fulfillment. The seller can be a VTEX seller or an external one.

marketplaceOrderId.description: Identifies the order. The seller should use this ID to trigger the fulfillment process of the corresponding order.
